price: Iryo ni ryo juru tuzaha abagaragu bacu bagandukira (Allah) ngo barizungure.
arabic: تِلۡكَ ٱلۡجَنَّةُ ٱلَّتِي نُورِثُ مِنۡ عِبَادِنَا مَن كَانَ تَقِيّٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: til'ka al-janatu allatī nūrithu min ʿibādinā man kāna taqiyyan
